alert.note: Alert for Dukes; Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 20 at 2:54AM EST until January 20 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Shallow pockets of flooding less than one foot deep during this morning`s high tide. * WHERE...Dukes MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Roads remain passable. Low lying areas and roads near Edgartown Harbor, including the Chappy Ferry Dock, may see shallow pockets of flooding less than one foot deep. Shallow flooding may also approach Five Corners in Vineyard Haven but any flooding will not be as significant as what occurred last week. Low lying areas and roads near Nantucket Harbor, including Easy Street, may experience pockets of shallow flooding less than one foot deep. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Edgartown MLLW Categories - Minor 4.0 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.2 ft, Moderate 4.2 ft, Major 5.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 20/07 AM 3.6/ 4.1 2.7/ 3.2 1.0/ 1.5 2 None 20/08 PM 2.2/ 2.7 1.5/ 2.0 0.5/ 1.0 2-3 None 21/08 AM 3.2/ 3.7 2.3/ 2.8 0.6/ 1.1 1-2 None 21/09 PM 2.1/ 2.6 1.3/ 1.8 0.2/ 0.8 1 None 22/09 AM 3.0/ 3.5 2.2/ 2.7 0.4/ 0.9 1 None 22/10 PM 1.4/ 1.9 0.6/ 1.1 -0.3/ 0.2 2-3 None Vineyard Haven MLLW Categories - Minor 4.5 ft, Moderate 6.0 ft, Major 7.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.5 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 20/07 AM 2.7/ 3.2 0.7/ 1.1 1.1/ 1.6 2 None 20/08 PM 1.9/ 2.3 -0.2/ 0.3 0.6/ 1.1 2 None 21/08 AM 2.2/ 2.7 0.2/ 0.7 0.6/ 1.1 2 None 21/09 PM 1.6/ 2.0 -0.5/ 0.0 0.2/ 0.8 1-2 None 22/09 AM 2.1/ 2.6 0.1/ 0.6 0.5/ 1.0 1 None 22/10 PM 1.1/ 1.6 -1.0/-0.5 -0.2/ 0.2 2-3 None Nantucket Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 20/07 AM 4.4/ 4.9 0.8/ 1.3 1.0/ 1.5 3 None 20/08 PM 3.1/ 3.6 -0.6/-0.1 0.6/ 1.1 3 None 21/08 AM 4.0/ 4.5 0.4/ 0.9 0.6/ 1.1 3 None 21/09 PM 2.7/ 3.2 -0.9/-0.4 0.4/ 0.9 2 None 22/09 AM 3.7/ 4.2 0.1/ 0.6 0.2/ 0.8 1 None 22/10 PM 2.1/ 2.6 -1.6/-1.1 -0.3/ 0.2 3 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
